testcase.name: T5_notifyRegisteredCustomers
testcase.system-out: Customer added successfully: Customer{name='John', contactInfo='john@example.com', isRegistered=false, vehicles=[Vehicle{registrationNumber='123', make='Toyota', model='Corolla'}]} Customer added successfully: Customer{name='Jane', contactInfo='jane@example.com', isRegistered=false, vehicles=[Vehicle{registrationNumber='456', make='Honda', model='Civic'}]}

testcase.name: T1_addCustomer_ValidDetails
testcase.system-out: Customer added successfully: Customer{name='John Doe', contactInfo='123-456-7890', isRegistered=false, vehicles=[Vehicle{registrationNumber='ABC123', make='Toyota', model='Corolla'}]}

testcase.name: T7_getRegisteredCustomers
testcase.failure: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: There should be one registered customer ==> expected: <1> but was: <0> at MenuTest.T7_getRegisteredCustomers(MenuTest.java:142)
testcase.system-out: Customer added successfully: Customer{name='John', contactInfo='john@example.com', isRegistered=false, vehicles=[Vehicle{registrationNumber='123', make='Toyota', model='Corolla'}]} Customer added successfully: Customer{name='Jane', contactInfo='jane@example.com', isRegistered=false, vehicles=[Vehicle{registrationNumber='456', make='Honda', model='Civic'}]}

testcase.name: T2_addCustomer_MissingFields
testcase.system-out: Invalid customer details. Customer not added.

testcase.name: T3_addVehicleToCustomer_ValidCustomer
testcase.system-out: Customer added successfully: Customer{name='John Doe', contactInfo='123-456-7890', isRegistered=false, vehicles=[Vehicle{registrationNumber='ABC123', make='Toyota', model='Corolla'}]} Vehicle added successfully to customer: John Doe

testcase.name: T8_getUnregisteredCustomers
testcase.failure: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: There should be one unregistered customer ==> expected: <1> but was: <2> at MenuTest.T8_getUnregisteredCustomers(MenuTest.java:159)
testcase.system-out: Customer added successfully: Customer{name='John', contactInfo='john@example.com', isRegistered=false, vehicles=[Vehicle{registrationNumber='123', make='Toyota', model='Corolla'}]} Customer added successfully: Customer{name='Jane', contactInfo='jane@example.com', isRegistered=false, vehicles=[Vehicle{registrationNumber='456', make='Honda', model='Civic'}]}

testcase.name: T9_addSupplier_ValidSupplier
testcase.failure: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: There should be one supplier ==> expected: <1> but was: <2> at MenuTest.T9_addSupplier_ValidSupplier(MenuTest.java:126)
testcase.system-out: Manufacturer and supplier added successfully. Supplier added successfully to manufacturer: Toyota
